ud1.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud1.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahakassapo pippaliguhayam viharati abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
ud1.6:1.4: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo aparena samayena tamha abadha vutthasi.
ud1.6:1.5: Atha kho ayasmato mahakassapassa tamha abadha vutthitassa etadahosi:
ud1.6:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena pancamattani devatasatani ussukkam apannani honti ayasmato mahakassapassa pindapatapatilabhaya.
ud1.6:2.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo tani pancamattani devatasatani patikkhipitva pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi—
ud1.6:2.4: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam mahakassapam rajagahe pindaya carantam yena daliddavisikha kapanavisikha pesakaravisikha.
ud1.6:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
